caption.p: IOE improves cardiac function. (A) Echocardiography images of each group. Bar graphs of (B) LVIDd, (C) LVIDs, (D) LVEF and (E) LVFS. Data are presented as the mean Â± standrd deviation. n=10. ##P<0.01 vs. Sham. *P<0.05 and **P<0.01 vs. MI/R. IOE, Inonotus obliquus extract; LV, left ventricular; LVIDd, LV internal dimensions at diastole; LVIDs, LV internal diameter systole; LVEF, LV ejection fraction; LVFS, LV fractional shortening; MI/R, myocardial ischemia/reperfusion.
